meanings.definition: A rosette or knot of ribbons worn in a hat as a badge.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her collection of colorful cockades on her hat.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers wore cockades on their hats to show their allegiance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the cockades from the hats and played with them.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant cockades on her hat were like little bursts of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The cockades fluttered in the wind, adding a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.definition: A badge or ornament worn on the hat.
meanings.sent1: He carefully pinned the shiny cockades to his hat for the parade.
meanings.sent2: The cockades on the hats of the guests added a festive touch to the event.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat, and it was wearing tiny cockades.
meanings.sent4: Her hat was a garden of cockades, each representing a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The cockades sparkled under the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
